result.purpose: Responsible for generating and handling tasks related to crawling ABI data from Ethereum contracts.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to ABI crawling tasks in separate Go files.

internal/domains/web3/tasks/abi_crawl_ta.purpose: Generates and enqueues tasks for crawling ABI data from contracts using an explorer client.

internal/domains/web3/tasks/abi_crawler..purpose: Handles tasks related to crawling ABI data from Ethereum contracts.
